chapters.title: Prologue:  Glimmers of the Pattern
chapters.info: Serancha Colvine, p. 50 (45)—Aes Sedai of the Gray Ajah, and Head Clerk of the Gray Ajah (the head of the Grays). She was a very strong advocate of Andaya being raised Sitter. Seaine and Pevara put powdered itchoak in her shift when they were Accepted.
